File Name

File name should not be longer than 31 characters, otherwise style linking does not work in MS Word/Mac.

file name is too long: '40', max. 31.

Please investigate.

OK: '.notdef' advance width is 600.

".null"

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

table version 4.

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin'

name

MS NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Ex, Sm, X, Semi, Demi, Dm, Ultra, Xtra'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '36' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed Thin' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin' (NID 1).

Pass

MS NID 4

If NID 2 is 'Regular': MS NID 4 = NID 1

NID 4 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed ExtraLight' ≠ NID 1 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt'

Pass

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '42' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed ExtraLight' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt' (NID 1).

Pass

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.000;GOOG;noto-source:20170915:90ef993387c0' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.0'.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '37' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed Light' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Light' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.monotype.com/studio, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedMedium'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed Medium' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Med' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

MS NID 16

Check Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI'

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed SemiBold'

Warning

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '40' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed SemiBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond SemBd' (NID 1).

Pass

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31, otherwise it does not work in MS Word 2011/Mac.

NID 4 length is '40' but shouldn't be longer than 31 characters.
'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed Bold'

Warning

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed Bold' ≠ NID 1 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Pass

name/head

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '36' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed Bold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '41' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed ExtraBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtBd' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '37' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI ExtraCondensed Black' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Blk' (NID 1).

Pass

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'http://www.google.com/get/noto/'

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

GPOS table does not have kerning feature. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

post

Every PostScript name is fine.

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.
